page.title: 12Recreation and events
page.content: The following{Clubs}are operational in Rusper in 1985.Mothers' and toddlers Group,Young Wives Group,Art Group, Conservative Association,Bingo Club, Ex-Servicemen's Association,Whist Club Women's Social Club,Brownies,Girl Guides,Rangers,Youth Club,Football Club,and Snooker Club.There is also a well-used{children's playground.}The main{annual events }are Rusper School Fete(July),Rusper Flower and Produce Show(September),Church Jumble Sale (October),Church Bazaar(November),the Art Group Exhibition(Autumn),and the Harvest Supper.In addition big Fetes, in which all village organisations take part,are held for{special fund {raising,}the latest of these being in June 1980 to pay for the restoration of the church roof.
